ai.summary: A short, easy 0.5 km hike in the UK countryside. Suitable for beginners, it offers a quick escape to open fields along quiet paths and hedgerows.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat or gently undulating terrain with well-maintained paths. Expect a mix of grassy tracks, gravel paths, and possibly a short paved section.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly, even for short walks. Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear and stay on marked paths. Be mindful of uneven surfaces, roots, or stones. Watch for other pedestrians and cyclists on shared trails. Bring a phone with emergency contacts and a light rain jacket in case of rain.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or offline directions
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and summer offering the most comfortable conditions; autumn for color; winter requires warm clothing and awareness of shorter daylight.

seo.meta_description: A short, easy 0.5 km hike in the UK countryside. Gentle terrain and a quick escape to open fields, ideal for beginners.
